mapper.insert: insert into taco_order (name, street, city, state, zip, ccNumber, ccExpiration, ccCVV, placedAt) values (#{name}, #{street}, #{city}, #{state}, #{zip}, #{ccNumber}, #{ccExpiration}, #{ccCVV}, #{placedAt})
mapper.select: select * from taco_order where name = #{username} order by placedAt limit #{pageNum}, #{pageLength}
